title: Popeyes VS Chick-fil-A, Phylicia Rashad, Meek Mill, Eddie Murphy and more.
itunes:title: Popeyes VS Chick-fil-A, Phylicia Rashad, Meek Mill, Eddie Murphy and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Today's show is LIVE and in living vivid color.  Pastor has a verdict between the chicken sandwiches.  Phylicia Rashad is with us to discuss her show on OWN David Makes Men.  Meek Mill's case has officially ended after pleading guilty to a misdemeanor.  Uncle Steve gives us Sand and Soul information with a new tone.  Eddie Murphy returns to SNL after 30 years.  Dwight Howard is back with The Lakers.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog talks to us about what happens after a door closes and more.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
